title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 7 categories on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of logins in each Platform on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Facebook where Share of logins is 53.1.
The lowest category is found at Live where Share of logins is 0.11.
The highest value at Facebook is almost 482.73 times larger than the minimum value of Live.
The highest value at Facebook is almost 482.73 times larger than the minimum value of Live.
The difference between the max Platform Facebook and min Platform Live is 52.99.
